sentence.Network_en: Her mistakes looked easily reparable in the light of her restored self-confidence .
sentence.Network_cn: 她恢复了自信心以后，所犯的错误似乎也并非不可补救了。

sentence.Network_en: This destruction is, perhaps, the least reparable of the ecological ravages which distinguish our age.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种语言上的破坏, 或许是我们历史阶段的社会生态破坏中最不能修复的.
